reporter_caption.center: ONE HONDA v. ST., MISS. DEPT. OF WILDLIFE, 676 So.2d 923 (Miss.App. 1996)

caption.center: ONE HONDA FOUR-WHEELER, SERIAL NO. 478TE150XMA318729; One Ted Williams .22
Rifle, Serial No. R379074; One Glenfield .22 Rifle, Serial No. 22437007
and One Headlight v. STATE of Mississippi, ex rel. MISSISSIPPI DEPARTMENT

opinion.posture: Appeal from Issaquena County Circuit Court, Frank G. Vollor, Ruling Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Travis T. Vance, Jr., Vicksburg, for Appellants.
Michael C. Moore, Attorney General, Joan Myers, Sp. Asst. Attorney General, Jackson, for Appellee.
opinion.panel: Before BRIDGES, P.J., and KING and SOUTHWICK, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Reversed and Remanded.
FRAISER, C.J., THOMAS, P.J., and BARBER, COLEMAN, DIAZ, McMILLIN and PAYNE, JJ., concur.
